fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: This variable, in contrast to v2elsuffrage, covers de facto enfranchised adults and not de jure. For example, the scores reflect whether an electoral regime was interrupted or not. If an electoral regime is interrupted (see v2x_elecreg), v2msuffrage is zero while v2elsuffrage may still be 100.
fxInfo_question: What is the approximate percentage of enfranchised male adults older than the minimal voting age?
fxInfo_sources: Bilinski (2015); Chronicle of Parliamentary Elections (IPU); Nohlen et al. (1999, 2002, 2005, 2010); constituteproject.org; v2x_elecreg.
name: v2msuffrage
